jNab.core.plugins
Class AbstractPlugin

java.lang.Object
  jNab.core.plugins.AbstractPlugin
Direct Known Subclasses:
DicePlugin, EchoPlugin, GreenOrangeRedWithEarsPlugin, NullPlugin, SystemOutLoggerPlugin, TalkiePlugin
public abstract class AbstractPlugin
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class that all bunny plugins must extend.

Field Detail

bunny

protected Bunny bunny
Bunny to which this plugin belongs.

name

protected java.lang.String name
Name of the plugin.

parameters

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Couple<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.String>> parameters
Map containing the parameters of this plugin. The key is a parameter name, and the value is a couple whose first element is a boolean indicating if the parameter is set and whose second element is the parameter value (if set).

Parameters:

parameterNames - the names of parameters supported by this plugin.

public boolean isParameterValid(java.lang.String paramName)
Checking that a parameter is available for this plugin.

Parameters:
paramName - the name of the parameter.
Returns:

setParameter

public boolean setParameter(java.lang.String paramName,
                            java.lang.String paramValue)
Setting a parameter value for this plugin.

Parameters:
paramName - the name of the parameter to set
paramValue - the value to set for this parameter.
Returns:
true if the parameter value has been set, false if no the parameter whose name is paramName is supported by this plugin.

isParameterSet

public boolean isParameterSet(java.lang.String paramName)
Testing if a given parameter is set.

Parameters:
paramName - the name of the parameter.
Returns:
true is the parameter whose name is paramName is set, false else.

getParameterValue

public java.lang.String getParameterValue(java.lang.String paramName)
Getting the value set for a parameter of this plugin.

Parameters:
paramName - the name of the parameter whose value is requested.
Returns:
the value set for the parameter called paramName, or null if no value is setor if parameter is invalid.
